title: Snowed in at Silver Mountain
description: She saved him. Now he will save her.Rough around the edges, Pax had one saving grace in prison--Faith's letters. Unfortunately, her words were never meant for him, but for her brother. She has no idea he exists. Fresh out of prison, he vows to change... just not yet. Faith is in danger.Faith is a naturalist and ranger at Silver Mountain. "Sublime" means both beauty and danger and she's surrounded by it on a daily basis. The breathtaking vistas are truly wonders from God, though its hard to live in such a solitary wilderness by herself, When trouble heads her way because of her brother's seedy past, Faith is dragged away by a man who says he's there to keep her from getting killed.Does Faith have it in her to trust a brooding stranger? Goodness! He's sublime incarnate, isn't he? Apparently she's a sucker for his kind of beauty and danger, especially when her life... and heart depend on it.
author: Stephanie Fowers
